programme.title: Park Avenue's colourful Christmas
programme.short_synopsis: Festive fairy lights remind Alistair Cooke of a time when Christmas was less than holy.
programme.medium_synopsis: Whilst looking on the tasteful fairy lights of Park Avenue's festival decorations, Alistair Cooke reflects on how, not so long ago, Christmas had a reputation of debauchery.
programme.long_synopsis: Whilst looking on the tasteful fairy lights of Park Avenue's festival decorations, Alistair Cooke reflects on how, not so long ago, Christmas had a reputation of debauchery.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: Park Avenue's colourful Christmas

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
